Package HoleFillerLib

Class HoleFiller

  • java.lang.Object
    • HoleFillerLib.HoleFiller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WeightedHeuristic
    public abstract class HoleFiller
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeightedHeuristic
    Library for fixing holes in 2D images. Assumptions: - The image contains up to one consecutive hole, defined by the neighbor heuristic. - The hole is buffered from the image edge by at least 1 pixel One of the following recognized neighbor heuristics should be used. For example: Heuristic | 4way | 8way Name | FOUR_WAY | EIGHT_WAY ------------------------------------------ Neighbors | N | N N N (in 2D) | N X N | N X N | N | N N N

      • HoleFiller

        public HoleFiller​(org.opencv.core.Mat image,
                  HoleFiller.NEIGHBOR_HEURISTIC neighborHeuristic)
        Parameters:
        image - - A floating point gray-scale image with values between 0 and 1. The hole is represented by a consecutive patch of -1 values.
        neighborHeuristic - - one of 4way or 8way, as specified above

    • Method Detail

      • fixImage

        public void fixImage()
        Primary logic for regenerating the corrupted image. Fills the hole in the image by finding boundary pixels, and filling each pixel u in the hole using the following heuristic: I(u) = Sum(w(u,v))*I(v) for v in B / Sum(w(u,v)) for v in B Where: I - Corrupted image B - Set of boundary coordinates w(u,v) - Some weight function Once finished, the regenerated image can be retrieved through getFixedImage, or saved straight to file.

      • getFixedImage

        public org.opencv.core.Mat getFixedImage()
        Getter, gives access to the regenerated image. Should only be used after calling fixImage().
        Returns:
        The image after it was fixed, if fixImage was called.

      • setCorruptedImage

        public void setCorruptedImage​(org.opencv.core.Mat newImage)
        Setter, to allow this library to be reused with multiple images.
        Parameters:
        newImage - - A new matrix to be regenerated, with the same constraints as in constructor.

      • saveFixedImage

        public void saveFixedImage​(java.lang.String filename)
        Save the results of the fixed image to file. Note: Call only after fixImage()
        Parameters:
        filename - - path to save image, including extension.

      • findBoundary

        private java.util.ArrayList<Coord> findBoundary()
        Primary logic for finding the boundary pixels around the hole. The pixels can be found using convolutions with kernels intended on signaling a response at the edges of the hole. The edges are detected from multiple directions, and then superimposed onto one response image which is itself a representation of the boundary pixels.
        Returns:
        - A list of coordinated corresponding to each boundary pixel

      • findHole

        private java.util.ArrayList<Coord> findHole()
        Generate a list of all coordinates matching the hole.
        Returns:
        A list of coordinates

      • generateMask

        private org.opencv.core.Mat generateMask()
        Generate a matrix mask the shape of the original corrupted image, where only the hole is set as -1, and the rest of the image is 0.
        Returns:
        [[ I(11), I(12), -1, -1, ..., I(1n) ] [[ 0, 0, 0, -1, -1, ..., 0] ... =o ... [ I(m1), I(m2), -1, -1, ..., I(mn) ] ] [ 0, 0, 0, -1, -1, ..., 0] ]

      • sum

        private double sum​(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> list)
        Simple sum function - sums the values in a list of doubles.
        Parameters:
        list - - A list of doubles
        Returns:
        the sum

      • updateResponseMatrix

        private void updateResponseMatrix​(java.util.ArrayList<Coord> boundaryCoordinates,
                                  org.opencv.core.Mat responseMatrix,
                                  org.opencv.core.Mat[] partialResponses)
        Simplification of logic for superimposing multiple response images
        Parameters:
        boundaryCoordinates - - list to be updated
        responseMatrix - - image to be updated
        partialResponses - - a list of partial responses, each to a single kernel

      • regeneratePixelValue

        private double regeneratePixelValue​(java.util.ArrayList<Coord> boundary,
                                    Coord u)
        Logic for fixing one pixel within a hole.
        Parameters:
        boundary - - list of boundary coordiantes
        u - - the specific coordinates of the pixel being regenerated.
        Returns:
        - the new value to place in that pixel

      • regenerateHole

        private void regenerateHole​(java.util.ArrayList<Coord> boundary,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Coord> hole)
        Fully fixes the hole by applying the algorithm for calculated new pixel coloration for each pixel in the hole.
        Parameters:
        boundary - - set of boundary pixel coordinates
        hole - - set of hole pixel coordinates
